name: proc-that
description: proc(ess)-that - easy extendable etl tool for nodejs written in typesript

scripts.pretest: npm install && typings install && npm run clean && tsc
scripts.build: rimraf build dist && tsc --outDir dist -d && trash dist/**/*.spec.js && trash dist/**/*.spec.js.map
